title: Shop Supplements — Dr. Lotte
description: Discover the newfound ease of shopping for supplements. Create your Fullscript account today and have your order delivered straight to your doorstep!
cleaned_text: Discover the newfound ease of shopping for supplements. Create your Fullscript account today and have your order delivered straight to your doorstep! We utilize an online store called Fullscript for the majority of our products. It offers a convenient way to order the recommended items and have them delivered straight to your doorstep. Registering for an account is a breeze! To safeguard your privacy, the system will prompt you to create an account and log in each time you wish to view a product or make a purchase. Once you're logged in, you're all set to begin your shopping experience. Disclosures: I make a small profit from what you order on this website. Supplements are not intended to cure, treat, or prevent any medical problem or psychological disorder. The supplements are not intended to be a substitute for seeking professional medical advice and services and you purchase and use supplements at your own risk.
